errors.error_description: The git URL provided for cloning the controls library is incorrect, pointing to a non-existent repository 'qml-controls'.
correction_candidates: In the 'Controls library' section, change the repository URL to `git@github.com:pureqml/controls.git`.
In the 'Controls library' section, change the repository URL to `https://github.com/pureqml/qmlcore-controls.git`.
The command should be `git clone git@github.com:pureqml/controls.git controls`.
errors.golden_answer: In the 'Controls library' section, change the repository URL to `git@github.com:pureqml/controls.git`.
